alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:49PM AKST until February 23 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Juneau and the Icy Strait Corridor including Gustavus and Hoonah. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 3 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Flurries started in Juneau as of 230 PM. Snow will increase in intensity through the late afternoon into the early evening. Heaviest snowfall rates are expected Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
